name: py-bidscoin

description:
Converts and organises raw MRI data-sets according to the Brain Imaging
Data Structure (BIDS).

pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data

dependencies.name: py-pydicom
dependencies.description:
Pure python package for DICOM medical file reading and writing pydicom
is a pure Python package for working with DICOM files. It lets you read,
modify and write DICOM data in an easy "pythonic" way.

dependencies.name: py-pyqt5
dependencies.description:
PyQt is a set of Python v2 and v3 bindings for The Qt Company's Qt
application framework and runs on all platforms supported by Qt
including Windows, OS X, Linux, iOS and Android. PyQt5 supports Qt v5.

dependencies.description: PyQt6 is a comprehensive set of Python bindings for Qt v6.

dependencies.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,

A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,

Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
